com.escape.games.api
Interface TimerCancel

public interface TimerCancel

Represents token for cancelling a timer callback. Release the token upon expiration/cancellation of your timer, in the TimerCallback.

Author:
escape-llc

Method Summary
 boolean cancel()
          Signal to cancel the timer.
 boolean cancelled()
          Return whether cancel() was called.
 

Method Detail

cancel

boolean cancel()
Signal to cancel the timer. If accepted, there will be one last callback on next TBT after seeing this call. This is in a race condition with actual timer expiration.

Returns:
true: cancel accepted; false: not accepted, e.g. timer already expired.

cancelled

boolean cancelled()
Return whether cancel() was called. Meant to call this within the timer callback to check if you called cancel() on your token.

Returns:
true: cancel() was called; false: not called.
